data.message: Hahaha Emmanuel get out of your fantasy world! I would rip your tongue out and feed it to you partna!! I believe it's racist to believe just cause you're black you are superior to Whites. I suppose that's not in your eyes though cause only white people can be racist, right??

replies.message: If he's racist why is he my friend?  Man, just quit while you're behind..he'd flatten you, verbally and physically if you challenged him which I would not want to see as you Eminem acolytes only know foul language and violence like brutes.  Listen to The Bad Brains if you want a real pertinent message.
Cause you are against a white rapper
Your an idiot! If im racist then why was my best friend black???? Huh? Huh? Quit while you where never in the race to begin with.

Listen one final time.  I know you are "special", but it's not because he's white, it's because he promotes violence against women.  Please learn to spell you're for the last time. Ever heard of Third Bass?  WHITE
